flow.descriptionCdata:
140e0a25-6d7c-4e8e-9636-ddd61f2e7635.0303a6d3-ec52-4cc7-9472-ad7abba60fe2.description=Retrieves the type of the platform associated to the server. Inputs\: coreHost - The DNS name or IP Address of your SAS core. corePort - The port to Connect to your SAS core on. coreProtocol - The protocol to connect to your SAS core with. Either HTTP or HTTPS. coreUsername - The username for host. corePassword - The password for host. coreVersion - The version of SAS to use. serverName - The name of the server for which the platform type should be retrieved. serverID - The ID of the server for which the platform type should be retrieved. If provided, then the 'serverName' input is ignored. Responses\: success - retrieved successfully failure - failed to retrieve data Returns\: returnResult - The type pf the platform installed on the server (UNIX/WINDOWS). 140e0a25-6d7c-4e8e-9636-ddd61f2e7635.0d38e857-fda0-4f6e-a941-0e5b548e652b.prompt=Process Instance ID 140e0a25-6d7c-4e8e-9636-ddd61f2e7635.15be8cdb-d251-4613-b7fd-588471e52697.description=This workflow updates the Process Instance State using PEM API. Inputs\: _PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID - Process Instance Id _processInstanceState - Process Instance State (Use value from selection list CSA-ProcessInstance-State) Result\: _processInstanceState -Updated Process Instance State 140e0a25-6d7c-4e8e-9636-ddd61f2e7635.51d1f3dd-829b-4565-b7cc-e4f71b113d27.prompt=User Identifier 140e0a25-6d7c-4e8e-9636-ddd61f2e7635.54400faf-e646-4ef7-8203-8e8624f0ef57.prompt=Process Instance ID 140e0a25-6d7c-4e8e-9636-ddd61f2e7635.63a19b49-3573-4d81-9e47-fb79a04b0e1d.description=
This operation checks whether a string matches another string, using a specific matching rule. The "toMatch" input is the string that is checked for matching the "matchTo" expression. 

Inputs\:
    matchType - The type of match to perform.
Valid values\: Exact Match, Contains, Contains Once, Does Not Contain, Match All Words, Match No Words, Regex
Default value\: Exact Match
    toMatch - The string that is checked for matching.
    matchTo - The string to match against.
Example\: If "matchType" is “RegEx”, the "matchTo" input is a regular expression such as\: ^-?\d+(([\.,]\d+)?)+$. 
    ignoreCase - Specifies whether to ignore case when matching or not.
Valid values\: False, True
Default value\: False

Results\:
    returnResult - This is the primary output. It contains the string "Matches" if the "toMatch" string matches the "matchTo" string. Otherwise, it contains the string "Does Not Match".  

Responses\:
    success - The operation completed as stated in the description.
    failure - The operation completed unsuccessfully.
140e0a25-6d7c-4e8e-9636-ddd61f2e7635.706f8bd9-134f-4a21-9724-6f5353a0f570.callout=To do\: configure SA user in 3 steps 140e0a25-6d7c-4e8e-9636-ddd61f2e7635.8572e3f0-1dda-46b8-89fa-922f3c563f58.description=This workflow updates the Process Instance State using PEM API. Inputs\: _PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID - Process Instance Id _processInstanceState - Process Instance State (Use value from selection list CSA-ProcessInstance-State) Result\: _processInstanceState -Updated Process Instance State 140e0a25-6d7c-4e8e-9636-ddd61f2e7635.8c1f2a57-3ff1-4136-b98c-d6bccb76b221.prompt=User Identifier 140e0a25-6d7c-4e8e-9636-ddd61f2e7635.92b10b4d-edfc-4fc4-92df-4d5b0e52cc01.prompt=Process Instance ID 140e0a25-6d7c-4e8e-9636-ddd61f2e7635.bd604930-7cc5-4b44-b757-446e80673f1e.prompt=User Identifier 140e0a25-6d7c-4e8e-9636-ddd61f2e7635.d7aba86f-8693-4ff7-9412-f83364c99cb6.description=This workflow updates the Process Instance State using PEM API. Inputs\: _PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID - Process Instance Id _processInstanceState - Process Instance State (Use value from selection list CSA-ProcessInstance-State) Result\: _processInstanceState -Updated Process Instance State 140e0a25-6d7c-4e8e-9636-ddd61f2e7635.description=server.hostname\: hostname as it appears in SA (fqdn)
flow.name: VPC - Stop Virtual
